channel.title: SoMD Pokemon TCG Podcast
channel.itunes:subtitle: Pokemon Talk
channel.itunes:author: Nicholas Kirkpatrick
channel.itunes:summary: SoMD Pokemon TCG Podcast is a show about Pokemon that is broadcast from SoMD. The co-hosts provide you with fun unrehearsed Pokemon talk. A new episode is set to be released once a week.
channel.description: A Pokemon-related podcast produced in Lusby, the heart of Pokemon TCG in the Southern Maryland area.

item.title: Episode 1
item.itunes:author: Nicholas Kirkpatrick
item.itunes:subtitle: The First Episode
item.description: Diamond and Pearl 5 / Funny Set Names / Darkrai / City Championship Results / Team Austrailia / Mechanicsville Battle Road June 2007 Video / Sushi / RPS and Team Galactic's Wager / Co-hosts: Nicholas, Donnie, Chris, Robbie

item.title: Episode 2
item.itunes:author: Nicholas Kirkpatrick
item.itunes:subtitle: Pokeymanz 4 Life
item.description: Mewtwo l X / Release of English Sets / Masters- Are They Really #1? / Our Success on Podcast Alley / Emo Music? / Blissey / Great Encounters' Effect on the Metagame / Predictions for MD States, Nationals / Co-hosts: Nicholas, LJ, Robbie

item.title: Episode 3
item.itunes:author: Nicholas Kirkpatrick
item.itunes:subtitle: The Big Game Edition
item.description: OldSchool Pokemon Fun with Nintendo Power / Leaks of Set Contents / What's Japan Like? / POP Boosters / Unseen Forces: Great Set or Greatest Set? / Co-hosts: Nicholas, Cody, LJ, Jacob

item.title: Episode 4
item.itunes:author: Nicholas Kirkpatrick
item.itunes:subtitle: In the Wake of the Great Encounters Prerelease
item.description: Nicknames / Great Encounter Prerelease Fun / How Good Is the Set? / PTCG Video Game / More Prerelease Talk / Co-hosts: Nicholas, Robbie, Chris, Cody

item.title: Episode 5
item.itunes:author: Nicholas Kirkpatrick
item.itunes:subtitle: Top Tier or Rubbish
item.description: Gardevoir & Gallade / What is an Archetype? / Archetype Decks- Hot or Not? Part 1 / Co-hosts: Nicholas, Robbie, Chris, Jacob

item.title: Episode 6
item.itunes:author: Nicholas Kirkpatrick
item.itunes:subtitle: Pokemon Music I
item.description: Enjoy some Pokemon Music / 2BA Master / Nandakanda to Kikare Tara / Hajimari no Uta / Mezase Pokemon Master '98 / Pokemon Dance Mix / Bokura Pichu Pichu Brothers / Together / Lucky Lucky / Pokemon Hara Hara Relay / Pokemon Kimi ni Kimeta / Two Perfect Girls / Get Happy / Pokerap GS/ Thanks for Listening / Pokemon Master Quest Theme/ Co-hosts: Nicholas

item.title: Episode 7
item.itunes:author: Nicholas Kirkpatrick
item.itunes:subtitle: Maryland State Championship 2008
item.description: Making Fake Cards/ MD States Overview/ Pieces of Glass / Penalties by the PDF / Gallade's Psychic Cut / What Decks Made It to Top 8? / Venusaur+Dialga? / Sentret Evolves to Gallade / Thanx to Those Who Came to MD States / Flying Pokemon Physics / Co-hosts: Nicholas, Cody, Dylan

item.title: Episode 8
item.itunes:author: Nicholas Kirkpatrick
item.itunes:subtitle: Virginia State Championship 2008
item.description: Decks at MD States / Zerg / Fallacious Curse of the First / States Prizes Don't Pass Down? / Flippy New Deck / Highest Roll Goes First / Gallade Ruling / VA States Talk / Banning Cards / Co-hosts: Nicholas, Robbie, Jacob, Cody

item.title: Episode 9
item.itunes:author: Nicholas Kirkpatrick
item.itunes:subtitle: Pachirisu: Overrated?
item.description: Archetype Decks- Hot or Not? Part 2 / Skittles / Best Starter Pokemon in TCG? / More Archetype Talk / Co-hosts: Nicholas, LJ, Jacob, Dylan

item.title: Episode 10
item.itunes:author: Nicholas Kirkpatrick
item.itunes:subtitle: One Does Not Simply Pokemon Into Mordor
item.description: Super Smash Bros Brawl/ Size of Single Elimination in Swiss + Single Elimination Tournaments / Co-hosts: Nicholas, Jacob, Cody, Billy

item.title: Episode 11
item.itunes:author: Nicholas Kirkpatrick
item.itunes:subtitle: Lusby Battle Road June 2007
item.description: We Brought You Legends Awakened Info First / No High Rollers In Pokemon / LJ's LSD / The Burrito Pictures / Lusby Battle Road June 2007 Results / Origin of the Mudkip Meme? / Erika's Jigglypuff = New SD / Bad Reactions to TGW / Nicholas Throws Away RaiEggs / Take That, Curse of the First / Jacob = Worlds 2008 Participant? / Co-hosts: Nicholas, Jacob, Chris, LJ

item.title: Episode 12
item.itunes:author: Nicholas Kirkpatrick
item.itunes:subtitle: Goodbye, My Friend: DRE
item.description: What We Like About POP / The Next Modified Format / Worldwide Modified Format (Including Japan)? / Nicholas Hates Naruto Spoilers / Funeral Service for Cards Leaving Modified / Are We the Only Podcast in SoMD? / You Can Participate in somdpokemon.com / Co-hosts: Nicholas, Robbie, Chris, Jacob, LJ

item.title: Episode 13
item.itunes:author: Nicholas Kirkpatrick
item.itunes:subtitle: Burger King Chicken Is Good
item.description: Pokemon Cards at Burger King / Places to Eat for Pokemon Players / Subs v. Fast Food / A New Section on Pokemon TCG Podcast/ Co-hosts: Nicholas, Robbie, Chris, Jacob

item.title: Episode 14
item.itunes:author: Nicholas Kirkpatrick
item.itunes:subtitle: Charizard Returns?
item.description: Intense Fight in the Destroyed Sky / US Nationals and Decks That May Win / Pokemon TCG Sets: Jungle / Co-hosts: Nicholas, Jac, Robbie, Dylan

item.title: Episode 15
item.itunes:author: Nicholas Kirkpatrick
item.itunes:subtitle: Pokemon Music II
item.description: Enjoy Some Pokemon Music / Charinko Bousouzoku / He Drives Me Crazy / PokeRAP / Oltre I Cieli Dell Avventura / Pocket ni Fantasy / If Only Tears Could Bring You Back / Por Siempre Juntos / Pokemon World / Mewtwo's Island / Kimi no Soba de / Dance of the Bellossom / Co-hosts: Nicholas

item.title: Episode 16
item.itunes:author: Nicholas Kirkpatrick
item.itunes:subtitle: Gardellade- Can You Beat It?
item.description: US Nationals Gardellade Success / Intense Fight In the Destroyed Sky / Card Escalation / Co-hosts: Nicholas, Dylan, Robbie, JC

item.title: Episode 17
item.itunes:author: Nicholas Kirkpatrick
item.itunes:subtitle: Talk About Fossil with Flava
item.description: Jacob's Gardellade experience / Fossil / Co-hosts: Nicholas, Robbie, Dylan, Jac

item.title: Episode 18
item.itunes:author: Nicholas Kirkpatrick
item.itunes:subtitle: Legends Awakened Prerelease
item.description: Legends Awakened Prerelease / Team Rocket / Lawsuit Troll Uri Geller / Co-hosts: Nicholas, Robbie, JC, Billy Racer X

item.title: Episode 19
item.itunes:author: Nicholas Kirkpatrick
item.itunes:subtitle: Worlds 2008
item.description: Worlds 2008 Outcome / Legends Awakened Talk / Co-hosts: Nicholas, Dylan, Sue, Zillah
